We start the challenge with a login portal that says we’re not authenticated and can’t view this page (take note of the URI)
Change the URI to contain index.php and capture the request using Burp Suite, ZAP Proxy, or curl
In Burp Suite, go to the Proxy tab and enable Intercept Server Responses
Request the same webpage we did in the curl command and Forward the responses until you get an HTTP 302 Found reponse
Change the code to 200 OK and Forward the response to your browser, you should get a web page with the flag
